short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When you mute words, you won't see Posts that includes them in your LinkedIn feeds

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
*This chrome extension is made for LinkedIn.com to mute irrelevant post from your feed*

‚úÖNow a days LinkedIn is filled with lots of Influencer post and controversies which can distract Job seekers and those who use LinkedIn to add value to their life.
‚úÖSo, this extension will enable Users to Mute specific words which will hide all the post from their feeds containing those words. 

üìÉHow to use:
1Ô∏è‚É£ Install and click on extension, a Pop-up will appear.
2Ô∏è‚É£ You will see a toggle switch to turn off and on all the muted words all at once.
3Ô∏è‚É£ You will see a Blank to enter your word in which you have to type word that you want mute.
4Ô∏è‚É£ After entering your word, Click on "Mute" button or hit "Enter" key.
5Ô∏è‚É£ After this your page will reload and voila all the Post containing muted words will disappearüî•.
6Ô∏è‚É£To delete or unmute the word you will see a list of muted words in red colorüî¥. Hover on the word and if it turns greenüü¢, click on it to Unmute!
7Ô∏è‚É£EnjoyüöÄ
